TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStateRuntime

summary.span: 定義用於管理工作階段資料之介面的 ASP.NET 狀態服務。

span.span: Defines the interface used by the ASP.NET state service to manage session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 可以使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務來管理工作階段狀態外-處理序。ASP.NET can manage session state out-of-process by using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 類別會用此服務中的 unmanaged 程式碼來管理工作階段資料。The class is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage session data. 這個類別支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 使用 ASP.NET 狀態服務不管理 ASP.NET; 中的工作階段狀態的預設方法ASP.NET 預設支援同處理序工作階段狀態管理。Using the ASP.NET state service is not the default method of managing sessionstate in ASP.NET; ASP.NET supports in-process session-state management by default. 它也支援管理工作階段狀態，在 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中，第二個跨處理序選項，並啟用自訂的工作階段狀態管理解決方案。It also supports a second out-of-process option that manages session state in a Microsoft SQL Server database, and it enables custom session-state management solutions. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器用於處理工作階段資料。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ProcessRequest (IntPtr tracker, int verb, string uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessRequest([in]native int tracker, [in]int32 verb, [in]string uri, [in]int32 exclusive, [in]int32 timeout, [in]int32 lockCookieExists, [in]int32 lockCookie, [in]int32 contentLength, [in]native int content) cil managed

Public Sub ProcessRequest (tracker As IntPtr, verb As Integer, uri As String, exclusive As Integer, timeout As Integer, lockCookieExists As Integer, lockCookie As Integer, contentLength As Integer, content As IntPtr)
public: void ProcessRequest(IntPtr tracker, int verb, System::String ^ uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);
abstract member ProcessRequest : nativeint * int * string * int * int * int * int * int * nativeint -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: iStateRuntime.ProcessRequest (tracker, verb, uri, exclusive, timeout, lockCookieExists, lockCookie, contentLength, content)

param.name: tracker
param.span: 儲存在 Unmanaged ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中之物件的 指標。

span.span: An pointer to an object stored in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.
The action to take on the object.
An identifier for the session.

param.name: exclusive
param.span: 存放區中物件的存取類型。

span.span: The type of access to objects in the store.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 工作階段資料儲存的分鐘數。

span.span: The number of minutes the session data is stored.

param.name: lockCookieExists
param.span: 值，指出鎖定 Cookie 是否存在於從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器向 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器提出的原始要求中。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.name: lockCookie
param.span: 工作階段狀態中鎖定的擁有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength
param.span: 工作階段所儲存的資料長度 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The length, in bytes, of the data stored for the session.

param.name: content
param.span: 要為 Unmanaged ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中之工作階段儲存內容的 指標。

span.span: An pointer to the content stored for the session in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器用於處理工作階段資料。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 可以使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務來管理工作階段狀態外-處理序。ASP.NET can manage session state out-of-process by using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 方法用於 unmanaged 程式碼，在此服務所管理的工作階段資料。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage the session data. 這個成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

The action to take on the object.

param.span: 指出目前工作階段是否為未初始化、Cookieless 工作階段的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

param.span: 工作階段資料儲存的分鐘數。

param.span: 值，指出鎖定 Cookie 是否存在於從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器向 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器提出的原始要求中。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.span: 工作階段狀態中鎖定的擁有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength

param.span: 要為 Unmanaged ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中之工作階段儲存內容的 指標。

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器用於處理工作階段資料。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 可以使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務來管理工作階段狀態外-處理序。ASP.NET can manage session state out-of-process by using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 方法用於 unmanaged 程式碼，在此服務所管理的工作階段資料。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage the session data. 這個成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopProcessing() cil managed

summary.span: 停止儲存在 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中的工作階段資料處理。

span.span: Stops the processing of session data stored in ASP.NET state server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 可以使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務來管理工作階段狀態外-處理序。ASP.NET can manage session state out-of-process by using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 方法可由 unmanaged 程式碼，在此服務來停止處理的工作階段資料。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to stop processing the session data. 這個成員提供來支援 ASP.NET 狀態服務的.NET Framework 基礎結構實作，而且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member is provided to support the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).
